WorkItem.ClosedComment: Close, failure to follow posting guidelines:* Not enough information
WorkItem.Description: Specifically Readiness.  Rawr assumes that I will use readiness, but the optimizer creates a spec that does not actually take readiness as a talent.
WorkItem.Summary: Suggests not taking talents that are part of my rotation.

Comments.Message: Please follow our bug reporting guidelines, so that we're able to help you.
In other words, post toon and module as well as which version of Rawr that you are using so we may assist you.
If you are talking about Hunter, dont EVER optimize your talents. EVER
Yeah, there are quite a few modules that don't optimize well when optimizing talents. TankDK I've never been able to actually get to optimize talents on an individual basis and make it make sense.
